attributes.action: urge that the employers of Kelvin MacKenzie cancels his contract with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As you are aware, Mr MacKenzie showed his true, racist views, last week by ridiculing the nation of Scotland and accusing the people of Scotland of lacking the entrepreneurial skills that people in London and the South East have.  This is not the first time that MacKenzie has offended such a group of people. As well as calling Scottish People 'Tartan T***ers', he has offended the city of Liverpool in the aftermath of the Hillsborough disaster, falsely accusing fans of urinating on policeman and robbing dead fans of their possessions as well as storming the gates.
His rants in the last week about Scottish people have been racist and there should be no platform for such behaviour  in this country of many cultures and beliefs.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
